title: S5 Ep7: Anti-LGBT discrimination in transition economies
itunes:title: Anti-LGBT discrimination in transition economies
description: A recent experiment in Serbia, Turkey and Ukraine attempted to overcome deep-seated prejudice against the LGBT community using information. Ralph De Haas and Cevat Aksoy of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development tell Tim Phillips about which messages cut through, and what impact can they have in the face of religious and state hostility.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
